title: Kaymakçı
description: A large Bronze Age settlement on the western shore of lake Marmara in western Anatolia, overlooking the central Gediz river valley. The site is composed of an 8 hectare fortified citadel situated on a ridge, with evidence for a larger lower town below on the surrounding plain.

properties.description: the lower ridge of Gür Dağ, west of Lake Marmara
properties.title: Kaymakçı ridge
